text: Peddakarpamula is a village in Nagarkurnool district, Telangana, India, 28 km from Nagar Kurnool. It is one of the major gram panchayats in Kollapur constituency. The Present MLA is Mr. Jupally Krishna Rao. ==Demography== The village is administrated by a Sarpanch who is an elected representative of village as per constitution of India and Panchayati raj (India). {|class="wikitable sortable" !
